uk.co.strangeskies.text.properties

Interface LocaleProvider

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Observable<java.util.Locale>, ObservableValue<java.util.Locale>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    LocaleManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LocaleManagerService

    public interface LocaleProvider
extends ObservableValue<java.util.Locale>
    Management interface over and associate localiser instance, allowing the locale of that instance to be changed.

    A locale manager is observable over changes to its locale.
